snippet: The apprehension of Ahmed Abu Khattala may finally begin to address some of the persistent questions about who carried out the Libya attack and why.
abstract: Capture of Ahmed Abu Khattala could reveal answers to many questions that remain about attacks on American diplomatic mission in Benghazi, Libya; thriving industry of conspiracy theories, political scandals, talk show chatter and congressional hearings will now be confronted by man who played central role in attack.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya.

lead_paragraph: The apprehension of Ahmed Abu Khattala may finally begin to address some of the persistent questions about who carried out the Libya attack and why.

headline.seo: Ahmed Abu Khattala Capture May Shed Light on Benghazi Attack
headline.main: Brazen Figure May Hold Key to Mysteries
headline.print_headline: Brazen Figure May Hold Key To Mysteries
